Free Image Compressor - Reduce Image Size Online

Compress your PNG, JPG, JPEG, and WEBP images to reduce file size by up to 90% while maintaining visual quality. Our free online image compression tool works entirely in your browser - no uploads to servers, no registration required, and your images stay 100% private.

How to Compress Images

Step 1: Click "browse" or drag and drop your image file (PNG, JPG, JPEG, or WEBP) into the drop zone below.

Step 2: Select your preferred compression level - Low for minimal compression with highest quality, Medium for balanced results, or High for maximum file size reduction.

Step 3: Click "Compress Image" and wait a moment while your browser optimizes the image.

Step 4: Download your compressed image with visible before/after file size comparison.

Frequently Asked Questions

Does image compression reduce quality?

Our image compressor uses smart compression algorithms that significantly reduce file size while preserving visual quality. The Low compression setting maintains near-original quality, while Medium and High settings offer greater size reduction with minimal perceptible quality loss.

What image formats can I compress?

Our free image compressor supports all major image formats including PNG, JPG/JPEG, and WEBP. Each format is optimized using format-specific compression techniques for best results.

Is there a file size limit?

Since compression happens entirely in your browser, the only limit is your device's available memory. Most modern devices can easily handle images up to 50MB or larger.

Are my images uploaded to your servers?

No! This is a client-side tool - all image compression happens locally in your web browser using JavaScript. Your images never leave your device, making this tool completely private and secure.

Why compress images?

Compressed images load faster on websites, consume less bandwidth, save storage space, and improve SEO rankings. Smaller images mean faster page load times, better user experience, and lower hosting costs.
